org.demoiselle.signer.core.keystore.loader.implementation

Class FileSystemKeyStoreLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.demoiselle.signer.core.keystore.loader.implementation.FileSystemKeyStoreLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyStoreLoader

    public class FileSystemKeyStoreLoader
extends Object
implements KeyStoreLoader
    Implementing KeyStore loading based on PKCS12 or JKS standards

      • getKeyStore

        public KeyStore getKeyStore(String pinNumber)
        Attempts to load the KeyStore first in the PKCS12 pattern. If this is not possible, it will store the received exception and then attempt to load a KeyStore into the JKS standard. Failing in both attempts, it will throw an exception.
        Specified by:
        getKeyStore in interface KeyStoreLoader
        Parameters:
        pinNumber - pin
        Returns:
        keystore

      • getKeyStore

        public KeyStore getKeyStore()
        Not implemented, use getKeyStore (pinNumer)
        Specified by:
        getKeyStore in interface KeyStoreLoader
        Returns:
        NULL
        See Also:
        KeyStore

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
